original_title: On The Birthday of The Wind
overview: After a sleepless night, 19-year-old film student Ringo tunes into the words of Daisy, a cat dying from cancer who could understand Vietnamese. Daisy confides in Ringo, with the secret wisdom of a cat, the fallibility of memories, the hidden chaos in the quietness, and the meaning of death.
tagline: A conversation between a Vietnamese film student and a cat with an incurable illness.
title: On The Birthday of The Wind
